verses.verse: Now the Lord <S%H3068><s%> said <S%H559><s%> to Abram, <S%H87><s%> "Go <S%H1980><s%> forth from your country, <S%H776><s%> And from your relatives <S%H4138><s%> And from your father's house, <S%H1004><s%> To the land <S%H776><s%> which <S%H834><s%> I will show <S%H7200><s%> you;

And I will make <S%H6213><s%> you a great <S%H1419><s%> nation, <S%H1471><s%> And I will bless <S%H1288><s%> you, And make <S%H1431><s%> your name <S%H8034><s%> great; <S%H1431><s%> And so you shall be a blessing; <S%H1293><s%>

And I will bless <S%H1288><s%> those who bless <S%H1288><s%> you, And the one who curses <S%H7043><s%> you I will curse. <S%H779><s%> And in you all <S%H3605><s%> the families <S%H4940><s%> of the earth <S%H127><s%> shall be blessed. <S%H1288><s%>"

So Abram <S%H87><s%> went <S%H1980><s%> forth as the Lord <S%H3068><s%> had spoken <S%H1696><s%> to him; and Lot <S%H3876><s%> went <S%H1980><s%> with him. Now Abram <S%H87><s%> was seventy-five years <S%H8141><s%> old <S%H1121><s%> when he departed <S%H3318><s%> from Haran. <S%H2771><s%>

And Abram <S%H87><s%> took <S%H3947><s%> Sarai <S%H8297><s%> his wife <S%H802><s%> and Lot <S%H3876><s%> his nephew, <S%H1121><s%> <S%H251><s%> and all <S%H3605><s%> their possessions <S%H7399><s%> which <S%H834><s%> they had accumulated, <S%H7408><s%> and the persons <S%H5315><s%> which <S%H834><s%> they had acquired <S%H6213><s%> in Haran, <S%H2771><s%> and they set <S%H3318><s%> <S%H1980><s%> out for the land <S%H776><s%> of Canaan; <S%H3667><s%> thus they came <S%H935><s%> to the land <S%H776><s%> of Canaan. <S%H3667><s%>

And Abram <S%H87><s%> passed <S%H5674><s%> through <S%H5674><s%> the land <S%H776><s%> as far <S%H5704><s%> as the site <S%H4725><s%> of Shechem, <S%H7927><s%> to the oak <S%H436><s%> of Moreh. <S%H4176><s%> Now the Canaanite <S%H3669><s%> [was] then <S%H227><s%> in the land. <S%H776><s%>

And the Lord <S%H3068><s%> appeared <S%H7200><s%> to Abram <S%H87><s%> and said, <S%H559><s%> "To your descendants <S%H2233><s%> I will give <S%H5414><s%> this <S%H2088><s%> land. <S%H776><s%>" So he built <S%H1129><s%> an altar <S%H4196><s%> there <S%H8033><s%> to the Lord <S%H3068><s%> who had appeared <S%H7200><s%> to him.

Then he proceeded <S%H6275><s%> from there <S%H8033><s%> to the mountain <S%H2022><s%> on the east <S%H6924><s%> of Bethel, <S%H1008><s%> and pitched <S%H5186><s%> his tent, <S%H168><s%> with Bethel <S%H1008><s%> on the west <S%H3220><s%> and Ai <S%H5857><s%> on the east; <S%H6924><s%> and there <S%H8033><s%> he built <S%H1129><s%> an altar <S%H4196><s%> to the Lord <S%H3068><s%> and called <S%H7121><s%> upon the name <S%H8034><s%> of the Lord. <S%H3068><s%>
And Abram <S%H87><s%> journeyed <S%H5265><s%> on, continuing <S%H1980><s%> <S%H5265><s%> toward the Negev. <S%H5045><s%>

Now there was a famine <S%H7458><s%> in the land; <S%H776><s%> so Abram <S%H87><s%> went <S%H3381><s%> down <S%H3381><s%> to Egypt <S%H4714><s%> to sojourn <S%H1481><s%> there, <S%H8033><s%> for the famine <S%H7458><s%> was severe <S%H3515><s%> in the land. <S%H776><s%>

And it came <S%H1961><s%> about when <S%H9201><s%> he came <S%H7126><s%> <S%H935><s%> near <S%H7126><s%> to Egypt, <S%H4714><s%> that he said <S%H559><s%> to Sarai <S%H8297><s%> his wife, <S%H802><s%> "See <S%H2009><s%> now, <S%H4994><s%> I know <S%H3045><s%> that you are a beautiful <S%H3303><s%> woman; <S%H802><s%>

and it will come <S%H1961><s%> about when <S%H3588><s%> the Egyptians <S%H4713><s%> see <S%H7200><s%> you, that they will say, <S%H559><s%> 'This <S%H2088><s%> is his wife <S%H802><s%>'; and they will kill <S%H2026><s%> me, but they will let you live. <S%H2421><s%>

"Please <S%H4994><s%> say <S%H559><s%> that you are my sister <S%H269><s%> so <S%H4616><s%> that it may go <S%H3190><s%> well <S%H3190><s%> with me because <S%H5668><s%> of you, and that I may live <S%H2421><s%> on account <S%H1558><s%> of you."

And it came <S%H1961><s%> about when Abram <S%H87><s%> came <S%H935><s%> into Egypt, <S%H4714><s%> the Egyptians <S%H4713><s%> saw <S%H7200><s%> that the woman <S%H802><s%> was very <S%H3966><s%> beautiful. <S%H3303><s%>

And Pharaoh <S%H6547><s%>'s officials <S%H8269><s%> saw <S%H7200><s%> her and praised <S%H1984><s%> her to Pharaoh; and the woman <S%H802><s%> was taken <S%H3947><s%> into Pharaoh's house. <S%H1004><s%>

Therefore he treated <S%H3190><s%> Abram <S%H87><s%> well <S%H3190><s%> for her sake; <S%H5668><s%> and gave <S%H1961><s%> him sheep <S%H6629><s%> and oxen <S%H1241><s%> and donkeys <S%H2543><s%> and male <S%H5650><s%> and female <S%H8198><s%> servants <S%H8198><s%> and female <S%H860><s%> donkeys <S%H860><s%> and camels. <S%H1581><s%>

But the Lord <S%H3068><s%> struck <S%H5060><s%> Pharaoh <S%H6547><s%> and his house <S%H1004><s%> with great <S%H1419><s%> plagues <S%H5061><s%> because <S%H5921><s%> <S%H1697><s%> of Sarai, <S%H8297><s%> Abram's wife. <S%H802><s%>

Then Pharaoh <S%H6547><s%> called <S%H7121><s%> Abram <S%H87><s%> and said, <S%H559><s%> "What <S%H4100><s%> is this <S%H2088><s%> you have done <S%H6213><s%> to me? Why <S%H4100><s%> did you not tell <S%H5046><s%> me that she was your wife <S%H802><s%>?

"Why <S%H4100><s%> did you say, <S%H559><s%> 'She is my sister, <S%H269><s%>' so that I took <S%H3947><s%> her for my wife <S%H802><s%>? Now <S%H6258><s%> then, here <S%H2009><s%> is your wife, <S%H802><s%> take <S%H3947><s%> her and go. <S%H1980><s%>"

And Pharaoh <S%H6547><s%> commanded <S%H6680><s%> [his] men <S%H376><s%> concerning <S%H5921><s%> him; and they escorted <S%H7971><s%> him away, <S%H7971><s%> with his wife <S%H802><s%> and all <S%H3605><s%> that belonged to him.
